ingredients.item: 350g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Mini Breast Fillets, halved lengthways
350g tub essential Waitrose Tomato and Basil Sauce

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200˚C, gas mark 6. Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the chicken, pepper and onion for 7-8 minutes, add 2 tbsp of the tomato and basil sauce with 2 tbsp water and cook for 1 minute.
Divide between the 8 lasagne sheets, roll up and place in an ovenproof serving dish.
Mix 3 tbsp water into the remaining tomato and basil sauce and spoon over the cannelloni, sprinkle with the cheese. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden.
